Package com.what2see.service.tour.search

package com.what2see.service.tour.search
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.what2see.service.tour
     
  • Class
    Description
    TourSearch
    Implementation of the Strategy design pattern.
    This class is responsible for searching tours based on a generic strategy.
    TourSearchStrategy
    Implementation of the Strategy design pattern.
    This interface generalizes a search strategy for tours.
    TourSearchStrategyAdministrator
    Implementation of the Strategy design pattern.
    This class represents a concrete strategy for searching tours that is suitable for Administrators.
    This strategy can look for public and privatee tours and sort them by descending order based on the following criteria (order of precedence): reports count reviews count marked count
    TourSearchStrategyGuide
    Implementation of the Strategy design pattern.
    This class represents a concrete strategy for searching tours that is suitable for Guides.
    This strategy can look for public and private (only if created by the current guide) tours and sort them by descending order based on the following criteria (order of precedence): created by current guide reviews count marked count
    TourSearchStrategyTourist
    Implementation of the Strategy design pattern.
    This class represents a concrete strategy for searching tours that is suitable for Tourist.
    This strategy can look for public and private (only if shared with the current tourist) tours and sort them by descending order based on the following criteria (order of precedence): reviews count marked count
